192.168.0.0/32 === 1 (2^0) == 192.168.0.0
192.168.0.0/31 === 2 (2^1) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.1
192.168.0.0/30 === 4 (2^2) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.3
192.168.0.0/29 === 8 (2^3) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.7
192.168.0.0/28 === 16 (2^4) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.15
192.168.0.0/27 === 32 (2^5) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.31
192.168.0.0/26 === 64 (2^6) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.63
192.168.0.0/25 === 128 (2^7) == 192.168.0.0- 192.168.0.127
192.168.0.0/24 === 256 (2^8) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.255
192.168.0.0/23 === 512 (2^9) == 192.168.0.0 - 192.168.0.255




192.168.0.0/16 === 65536 (2^16) == 192.168.0.0
192.168.0.0/0 === all ip == 192.168.0.0
